name: Memory Maze (Arasti)
description: Memory Maze is a game designed to develop spatial memory. At the beginning you are given a maze map. Then you need to go through this maze in space from memory. An initial score is assigned to each labyrinth. For each in-game help or coming back when solving the maze, these points are reduced. You can set the basic characteristics of the mazes. According to them, the maze will be generated procedurally. The game was created by 1 person. Please rate my game and leave a review.
